props.name: state
props.description: The interactive state of the input, corresponds to the 'State' property in Figma.

props.name: showPassword
props.description: Toggles the visibility of the password text, corresponds to the 'Show Password' property in Figma.

props.name: filled
props.description: Indicates if the input has content, corresponds to the 'Filled' property in Figma.

props.name: label
props.description: The text label displayed above the input field.

props.name: placeholder
props.description: The placeholder text displayed inside the input field.

props.name: value
props.description: The value of the input field.

props.name: onChange
props.description: Callback function that is fired when the input value changes.
